name: .SH3F File Extension
summary: Learn about .SH3F files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Collection of 3D models that can be imported into Sweet Home 3D, a free interior design program; may include furniture, windows, doors, shelving, lamps, or other household objects.

content: 3D models can be imported into Sweet Home 3D by simply double-clicking the SH3F file or by choosing "Import Furniture..." from the Furniture menu within the program.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
